page.title: 18MY SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I get up at 7.30 and after washing and dressing I have breakfast then I get some dinner money off my mum and catch the bus for school. I do not have to pay the bus fare because the school is over 3 miles from my house, so I have a bus pass. When we get to school we have Registration then lessons. At break I sometimes buy a packet of crisps for 12p. In science we are doing Plant Reproduction, which I do not like. I usually buy chips for dinner from the Chip Shop and a Vimto drink. In the afternoon we have music, religious education and humanities. {(Education)} After school I change out of my school uniform into my play things. I call for my friend and we do stunts on our BMX's or we go into the woods on them. After tea we play cricket with some other friends then I watch television.
